parent_collections.title: Brimblecombe, K.R. et al. (2023) Inhibition of striatal dopamine release by the L-type calcium channel inhibitor isradipine, co-varies with risk factors for Parkinson’s.

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"f0r2a","text":"Take samples out of the -80°C freezer and keep on dry ice until ready to digest. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fcfph","text":"On wet ice, add 200 µL RIPA Buffer (see Materials) to each unilateral striatum sample. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":40,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1vkda","text":"Mix thoroughly until sample completely blended with Tissue Tearor.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"aaqta","text":"Centrifuge samples at 6g for 5 min at 4ºC.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e5jba","text":"Using the supernatant, dilute samples to about 1:10 to determine protein concentration. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ad43e","text":"Prepare pre-diluted/standards: 1.0, 0.8, 0.6, 0.4, 0.2 and 0.0 mg/mL of Bovine Serum Albumin (BSA)","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":30}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1v5ev","text":"Prepare solution A: ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":20}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8tjso","text":"320 µL Copper (II) Sulfate Solution","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3ukp6","text":"16 mL Bicinchoninic Acid Solution","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1camr","text":"In a well plate, add 10 µL of pre-diluted samples/standards + 100 µL solution A.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ba9ic","text":"","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c84oa","text":"Do this in triplicate.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":22}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c5g4e","text":"Cover plates with film and incubate the samples for 30 min at 37ºC.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a4ksj","text":"Measure the absorbance of each sample at 562 nm using a spectrophotometer and create a standard curve to determine concentrations. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f9871","text":"Make up 83 µL samples in RIPA Buffer at a concentration of 20 µg/10 µL and then add 17 µL of 6x Loading Buffer (see Materials).","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":116,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5vpta","text":"Boil samples at this stage at 95 ºC for 5 min.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fmr3n","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6loci","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":61,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"3ue4q","text":"Always check antibody data sheet before performing this step.","type":"align-justify"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8rale","text":"Prepare 1X Running Buffer (see Materials) and add the pre-cast gel cassettes (4 – 12%).","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":31,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6k6m3","text":"Load 5 µL of sample per well. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"de0hh","text":"Load visual + developable ladder in first lane, and only developable ladder in last lane.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"egb8b","text":"Run electrophoresis for 60 min @ 200V/100mA.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9a4k2","text":"Transfer gel onto membrane and transfer using machine.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f44c4","text":"Wash membranes with TBST (see Materials) for approximately 1 min and repeat 4x.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":30,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3joh2","text":"Make up 50 mL TBST solution with 4% milk (dried powder).","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3rdof","text":"Roll membranes into 50 mL conical with 3 mL of TBST w/ Milk and Primary Antibody. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"65spr","text":"","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"79s0o","text":"The following primary antibody (working concentration 1:1000) was used in Brimblecombe, K. et al. (2023): anti-calb1 (Cell Signalling #13176).","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2hkik","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fs9j5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":57,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"d3dvi","text":"Primary Antibody Solutions can be re-used several times. ","type":"align-justify"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bfm8k","text":"Incubate overnight at 4 ºC or ~2 hours at room temperature.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5ou6s","text":"Wash membranes with TBST for approximately 1 min and repeat 4x.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7i44c","text":"Incubate membrane in TBST w/ Milk and Secondary Antibody HRP conjugated (1:3000) for 1 hour at room temperature.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2em1k","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fr2mu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":59,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"fk2cq","text":"Secondary Antibody Solutions can be re-used several times. ","type":"align-justify"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"senn","text":"Wash membranes with TBST for approximately 1 min and repeat 4x.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"45rcn","text":"Develop membranes with the chemiluminescent ECL Substrate Kit (~ 1 mL of each component). ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2gjl3","text":"Visualize gel on a Gel Doc System. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bd78m","text":"Put membrane back into TBST w/ Milk and the 1º/2º β-actin antibody (already conjugated, 1:50000).","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8lvie","text":"Repeat steps 25 and 26. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":7,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Western Blot
